title: Revenue per employee of leading tech companies 2018
yAxis: Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars for 8 number of Companys.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company Netflix and lowest at Company Amazon.
Company Netflix has 6.18 times more Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars than Company Amazon which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars in each Company on the y axis.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company Netflix and lowest at Company Amazon.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars for 8 number of Companys.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company Netflix and lowest at Company Amazon.
Company Netflix has 6.18 times more Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars than Company Amazon which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company Netflix and lowest at Company Amazon.
The second highest Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Company Apple.
The highest Company Netflix has 1864884.0 more Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars than the lowest Company Amazon.
Company Netflix is higher than any other Companys with value 2224555.0, followed by Apple, and Facebook. Down to Company Amazon with the lowest value 359671.0.
The lowest value 359671.0 at Amazon is almost 1.83 times smaller than the average value 1218917.25.
The Revenue per employee in U.S. dollars is 9751338.0 if we add up values of all Companys.
